rules.name: Deeds Worthy of Saga
rules.lore: Legendary deeds in the midst of battle are an intoxicating mead. Those who witness them are inspired to greater feats of daring and valour, determined to prove themselves worthy of their champions.
rules.text:
At the end of each Battle Round, select a Saga listed below. If the Saga was completed by by your army during that turn, gain the associated reward until the end of the battle.

At the start of the battle, you may select one Saga (excluding the Saga of Majesty) to be completed and gain its reward immediately.

Each Saga may only be completed once per battle.

options.name: Saga of the Warrior
options.text:
*Completion Requirement:* One of your +Adeptus Astartes+ +Character+ models destroyed an enemy +Character+ model.

*Reward*: All melee weapons equipped by your +Adeptus Astartes+ models have +[Sustained Hits 1]+.

options.name: Saga of the Bear
options.text:
*Completion Requirement:* One of your +Adeptus Astartes+ +Character+ models was reduced to below half its starting Health, but was not destroyed.

*Reward*: Your +Adeptus Astartes+ units have !Feel No Pain 6+!.

options.name: Saga of the Beastslayer
options.text:
*Completion Requirement:* One of your +Adeptus Astartes+ +Character+ models destroyed an enemy +Monster+ or +Vehicle+ model.

*Reward*: All melee weapons equipped by your +Adeptus Astartes+ models have +[Lethal Hits]+.

options.name: Saga of Majesty
options.text:
*Completion Requirement:* One or more objective markers in your opponent's deployment zone was under your control during Scoring.

*Reward*: Improve the Objective Control trait of all +Adeptus Astartes+ models in your army by 1.

spells.name: Jaws of the World Wolf
spells.effect: Draw a straight line 24" in any direction from the caster. Enemy units touching the line must take a Leadership test; units that fail suffer d6 mortal damage.

spells.name: Thunderclap
spells.effect: All enemy units within 6" take d6 damage, with an Armor Break trait of -1.

spells.name: Storm Caller
spells.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, the casting model and all models in its unit have +Stealth+.

strategems.name: Go for the Throat
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, your unit's melee weapons have their Armor Break trait improved by 1. If the Saga of the Beastslayer has been completed by your army, such weapons also gain +[Lance]+.

strategems.name: Relentless Assault
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, your unit is eligible Shoot even if it performs a Fall Back or Advance movement. If the Saga of the Warrior has been completed by your army, your unit is also eligible to Charge.

strategems.name: Runic Wards
strategems.when: Your opponent's Activation, after an enemy unit declares its Shooting or Fight targets
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit has !Feel No Pain 5+! against Mortal Damage and +Psychic+ attacks. If Saga of the Bear has been completed, your unit has !Feel No Pain 4+! against Mortal Damage and +Psychic+ attacks instead.
